channel.title: Client Hack?
channel.description:
Hello! I have a MAJOR problem that MUST be solved so I can continue with the production of my server... Here is a little background before I go on with the errors :D
Well I was looking for a good base source with good PK'ing (Since perfect PK is the HARDEST thing to add... Of course, in my opinion) and I found a really nice source - Devolution 7.9 / Real World 1.1 and I looked at it then I DL'ed it, I turn it on and I'm like sweet!
Now the problem -
After I get about 5 people on they 'play' for about 15 minutes then Me AND EVERYONE ELSE get a message saying "Client Hack Detected!" and then they cannot move nor log out. Then they get DC'ed and get these errors -
The 'Log' -
[IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj23/FfsDied/damnerrors.jpg[/img]
The Client -
[IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj23/FfsDied/damnerrors1.jpg[/img]
The character file -
[IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj23/FfsDied/damnerrors2.jpg[/img]
I need help with either removing the WHOLE 'Client Hack' thing or just making it so it doesn't empty my character file!
Please help! I will Rep ++ for help It is REALLY Urgent!
Thanks in advance
Skullator

item.title: Client Hack?
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

Yes it does, it just empties your char file… If I copy paste the content from one character file to mine it will work… I just deletes everything within it… That is why I cannot connect…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2008, 05:52:51 pm[/size][hr]sigh Now I won’t get any help because I will be pushed down…

Read full topic
